name: Farmer (AVerve)
description:
Story: The Farmer of our story decide to expand his farm he can not achieve his goal unless he water his crops and take care of them and collect all the tomatoes to sell them and earn big money!

* * * * * * * * * * * * * *

This game is the 3rd try to power learning unity sadly I couldn't finish my code myself and had to use internet and somehow my 3rd character controller turn out like that. even  the look of the game can not help the terrible camera movement.

Warning: Controls Terrible

* * * * * * * * * * * * * *

How to finish the game?

- Collect all 30 tomatoes

- Go near the water can, then grab the water slider and bring it to the maximum

- After doing these find the Dollar sign, it's near blue house and car.

- If you do that it trigger Happy ending!
